title: Projected total revenue of Amazon 2002 to 2022
yAxis: Net revenue in billion U.S. dollars
summary: In general Net revenue in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Net revenue in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2012 to 2022.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2020 and 2021.
The highest Net revenue in billion U.S. dollars, of value 356.0 was reached at Year 2022
Minimum Net revenue in billion U.S. dollars about 61.0 was reached at Year 2012
